Use dplyr verb select on skim_df objects.

Source: R/dplyr.r
select.skim_df.Rd

Use dplyr verb select on skim_df objects.

# S3 method for skim_df
select(.data, ...)

Arguments

.data

A skim object
...

One or more unquoted expressions separated by commas.

Value

skim_df object coerced to a data frame.

See also

dplyr::select()

  • Arguments
  • Value
